Uses of Package
ore.api

Packages that use ore.api
ore.api This package contains the classes that are used by a developer to interface with the ORE system. 
ore.chat.event   
ore.event This package maintains subscriptions for events and routes events to subscribers. 
ore.subscriber Classes which implement buffering and routing of events to specific clients using their Comet connections. 
 

Classes in ore.api used by ore.api
CollectionChangeListener
          Users implement this interface to be notified when a one-to-many or many-to-many collection has elements that are added or removed
Event
          Context data associated with an event for which a user wants to be notified.
PropertyChangeListener
          Users implement this interface to be notified when a property of a hibernate entity is modified directly.
 

Classes in ore.api used by ore.chat.event
CollectionChangeListener
          Users implement this interface to be notified when a one-to-many or many-to-many collection has elements that are added or removed
DefaultCollectionChangeListener
          Convenience implementation of CollectionChangeListener for users who only want to implement one of the methods
Event
          Context data associated with an event for which a user wants to be notified.
 

Classes in ore.api used by ore.event
Event
          Context data associated with an event for which a user wants to be notified.
